patthana20.4:4.1: Nasaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana20.4:5.1: Naganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana20.4:6.1: Naoghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana20.4:7.1: Nayogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana20.4:8.1: Nanīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.4:9.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.4:10.1: Naparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.4:11.1: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
